details:
noun
- the act of devising something
= synonyms: devisal
- a device or control that is very useful for a particular job
= synonyms: appliance, contraption, convenience, gadget, gizmo, gismo, widget
- any improvised arrangement for temporary use
= synonyms: lash-up
- the faculty of contriving
- an artificial or unnatural or obviously contrived arrangement of details or parts etc.
= example: an artificial or unnatural or obviously contrived arrangement of details or parts etc.
- an elaborate or deceitful scheme contrived to deceive or evade
= example: an elaborate or deceitful scheme contrived to deceive or evade
= synonyms: dodge
